00059 class DQMMessageAnalyzer: public edm::EDAnalyzer {
00060 public:
00061    explicit DQMMessageAnalyzer( const edm::ParameterSet& );
00062    ~DQMMessageAnalyzer();
00063    
00064   virtual void analyze( const edm::Event&, const edm::EventSetup& );
00065 
00066   virtual void endJob(void);
00067 
00068 private:
00069       // ----------member data ---------------------------
00070 
00071   void findMonitorElements(DQMEvent::TObjectTable&, std::string);
00072 
00073   bool useCompression_;
00074   int compressionLevel_;
00075   edm::StreamDQMSerializer serializeWorker_;
00076   edm::StreamDQMDeserializer deserializeWorker_;
00077 
00078   StreamDQMOutputFile * dqmOutputFile_;
00079 
00080   MonitorElement * h1;
00081   MonitorElement * h2;
00082   MonitorElement * h3;
00083   MonitorElement * h4;
00084   MonitorElement * h5;
00085   MonitorElement * h6;
00086   MonitorElement * h7;
00087   MonitorElement * h8;
00088   MonitorElement * h9;

00110 DQMMessageAnalyzer::DQMMessageAnalyzer( const edm::ParameterSet& iConfig )
00111   : counter(0)
00112 {
00113 
00114   std::cout <<" DQMMessageAnalyzer::DQMMessageAnalyzer CTOR" << std::endl;
00115   useCompression_ = iConfig.getParameter<bool>("useCompression");
00116   compressionLevel_ = iConfig.getParameter<int>("compressionLevel");
00117 
00118   dqmOutputFile_ = new StreamDQMOutputFile("dqm_events.bin");
00119 
00120 
00121   // get hold of back-end interface
00122   dbe = edm::Service<DQMStore>().operator->();
00123   
00124   const int NBINS = 5000; XMIN = 0; XMAX = 50;
00125 
00126   // book some histograms here
00127 
00128   // create and cd into new folder
00129   dbe->setCurrentFolder("C1");
00130   h1 = dbe->book1D("histo", "Example 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00131   h2 = dbe->book2D("histo2", "Example 2 2D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX, 
00132        NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00133   // create and cd into new folder
00134   dbe->setCurrentFolder("C1/C2");
00135   h3 = dbe->book1D("histo3", "Example 3 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00136   h4 = dbe->book1D("histo4", "Example 4 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00137   h5 = dbe->book1D("histo5", "Example 5 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00138   h6 = dbe->book1D("histo6", "Example 6 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00139   // create and cd into new folder
00140   dbe->setCurrentFolder("C1/C3");
00141   const int NBINS2 = 10;
00142   h7 = dbe->book1D("histo7", "Example 7 1D histogram.", NBINS2, XMIN, XMAX);
00143   char temp[1024];
00144   for(int i = 1; i <= NBINS2; ++i)
00145     {
00146       sprintf(temp, " bin no. %d", i);
00147       h7->setBinLabel(i, temp);
00148     }
00149   i1 = dbe->bookInt("int1");
00150   f1 = dbe->bookFloat("float1");
00151   s1 = dbe->bookString("s1", "my string");
00152 
00153   // create and cd into a new top level folder
00154   dbe->setCurrentFolder("D1");
00155   h8 = dbe->book1D("histo8", "Example 8 1D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00156   // create and cd into new sublevel folder
00157   dbe->setCurrentFolder("D1/D2");
00158   h9 = dbe->book2D("histo9", "Example 9 2D histogram.", NBINS, XMIN, XMAX, 
00159        NBINS, XMIN, XMAX);
00160 
00161   h2->setAxisTitle("Customized x-axis", 1);
00162   h2->setAxisTitle("Customized y-axis", 2);
00163 
00164   // assign tag to MEs h1, h2 and h7
00165   const unsigned int detector_id = 17;
00166   dbe->tag(h1, detector_id);
00167   dbe->tag(h2, detector_id);
00168   dbe->tag(h7, detector_id);
00169   // tag full directory
00170   dbe->tagContents("C1/C3", detector_id);
00171 
00172   // assign tag to MEs h4 and h6
00173   const unsigned int detector_id2 = 25;
00174   const unsigned int detector_id3 = 50;
00175   dbe->tag(h4, detector_id2);
00176   dbe->tag(h6, detector_id3);
00177 
00178   // contents of h5 & h6 will be reset at end of monitoring cycle
00179   h5->setResetMe(true);
00180   h6->setResetMe(true);
00181   dbe->showDirStructure();
00182 
00183   std::cout <<" DQMMessageAnalyzer::DQMMessageAnalyzer CTOR Done" << std::endl;
00184 
00185 }

00189    
00190    // do anything here that needs to be done at desctruction time
00191    // (e.g. close files, deallocate resources etc.)
00192    delete dqmOutputFile_;

00196 void DQMMessageAnalyzer::endJob(void)
00197 {
00198 
00199   std::cout << "DQMMessageAnalyzer::endJob" << std::endl;
00200   //dbe->save("test.root");  
00201 
00202   //Let us read the freshly writen dqm event file and display dqm events from there in
00203   StreamDQMInputFile dqm_file("dqm_events.bin");
00204   while(dqm_file.next()) {
00205 
00206       std::cout << "----------------DQM Event -------------" << endl;
00207 
00208       //Lets print it
00209       const DQMEventMsgView* dqmEventView = dqm_file.currentRecord();
00210 
00211       std::cout << "  DQM Message data:" << std::endl;
00212       std::cout << "    protocol version = "
00213                 << dqmEventView->protocolVersion() << std::endl;
00214       std::cout << "    header size = "
00215                 << dqmEventView->headerSize() << std::endl;
00216       std::cout << "    run number = "
00217                 << dqmEventView->runNumber() << std::endl;
00218       std::cout << "    event number = "
00219                 << dqmEventView->eventNumberAtUpdate() << std::endl;
00220       std::cout << "    lumi section = "
00221                 << dqmEventView->lumiSection() << std::endl;
00222       std::cout << "    update number = "
00223                 << dqmEventView->updateNumber() << std::endl;
00224       std::cout << "    compression flag = "
00225                 << dqmEventView->compressionFlag() << std::endl;
00226       std::cout << "    reserved word = "
00227                 << dqmEventView->reserved() << std::endl;
00228       std::cout << "    release tag = "
00229                 << dqmEventView->releaseTag() << std::endl;
00230       std::cout << "    top folder name = "
00231                 << dqmEventView->topFolderName() << std::endl;
00232       std::cout << "    sub folder count = "
00233                 << dqmEventView->subFolderCount() << std::endl;
00234       std::cout << "    time stamp = "
00235                 << dqmEventView->timeStamp().value() << std::endl;
00236       std::auto_ptr<DQMEvent::TObjectTable> toTablePtr =
00237         deserializeWorker_.deserializeDQMEvent(*dqmEventView);
00238       DQMEvent::TObjectTable::const_iterator toIter;
00239       for (toIter = toTablePtr->begin();
00240            toIter != toTablePtr->end(); toIter++) {
00241         std::string subFolderName = toIter->first;
00242         std::cout << "  folder = " << subFolderName << std::endl;
00243         std::vector<TObject *> toList = toIter->second;
00244         for (int tdx = 0; tdx < (int) toList.size(); tdx++) {
00245           TObject *toPtr = toList[tdx];
00246           std::string cls = toPtr->IsA()->GetName();
00247           std::string nm = toPtr->GetName();
00248           std::cout << "    TObject class = " << cls
00249                     << ", name = " << nm << std::endl;
00250         }
00251       }
00252     }
00253 }

00255 //

00258 
00259 void DQMMessageAnalyzer::findMonitorElements(DQMEvent::TObjectTable &toTable,
00260                                            std::string folderPath)
00261 {
00262   if (dbe == NULL) {return;}
00263   
00264   // fetch the monitor elements in the specified directory
00265   std::vector<MonitorElement *> localMEList = dbe->getContents(folderPath);
00266   //MonitorElementRootFolder* folderPtr = dbe->getDirectory(folderPath);
00267   
00268   // add the MEs that should be updated to the table
00269   std::vector<TObject *> updateTOList;
00270   for (int idx = 0; idx < (int) localMEList.size(); idx++) {
00271     MonitorElement *mePtr = localMEList[idx];
00272     if (mePtr->wasUpdated()) {
00273       updateTOList.push_back(mePtr->getRootObject());
00274     }
00275   }
00276   if (updateTOList.size() > 0) {
00277     toTable[folderPath] = updateTOList;
00278   }
00279 
00280   // find the subdirectories in this folder
00281   // (checking if the directory exists is probably overkill,
00282   // but we really don't want to create new folders using
00283   // setCurrentFolder())
00284   if (dbe->dirExists(folderPath)) {
00285     dbe->setCurrentFolder(folderPath);
00286     std::vector<std::string> subDirList = dbe->getSubdirs();
00287 
00288     // loop over the subdirectories, find the MEs in each one
00289     std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator dirIter;
00290     for (dirIter = subDirList.begin(); dirIter != subDirList.end(); dirIter++) {
00291       std::string subDirPath = folderPath + "/" + (*dirIter);
00292       findMonitorElements(toTable, subDirPath);
00293     }
00294   }
00295 }
00296 
00297 // ------------ method called to produce the data  ------------
00298 void DQMMessageAnalyzer::analyze(const edm::Event& iEvent, 
00299              const edm::EventSetup& iSetup )
00300 {   
00301 
00302   cout << "DQMMessageAnalyzer::analyze" << endl;
00303 
00304 
00305   // Filling the histogram with random data
00306   i1->Fill(4);
00307   f1->Fill(-3.14);
00308 
00309   srand( 0 );
00310 
00311   if(counter%1000 == 0)
00312     cout << " # of cycles = " << counter << endl;
00313 
00314   for(int i = 0; i != 20; ++i )
00315     {
00316       float x = gRandom->Uniform(XMAX);
00317       h1->Fill(x,1./log(x+1));
00318       h3->Fill(x, 1);
00319       h4->Fill(gRandom->Gaus(30, 3), 1.0);
00320       h5->Fill(gRandom->Poisson(15), 0.5);
00321       h6->Fill(gRandom->Gaus(25, 15), 1.0);
00322       h7->Fill(gRandom->Gaus(25, 8), 1.0);
00323       h8->Fill(gRandom->Gaus(25, 7), 1.0);
00324     }
00325 
00326   // fit h4 to gaussian
00327   h4->getTH1F()->Fit("gaus","Q");
00328 
00329   for ( int i = 0; i != 10; ++i )
00330     {
00331       float x = gRandom->Gaus(15, 7);
00332       float y = gRandom->Gaus(20, 5);
00333       h2->Fill(x,y);
00334       h9->Fill(x,y);
00335     }
00336   //      (*(*i1))++;
00337   //usleep(1000000);
00338 
00339   ++counter;
00340 
00341   cout << "Counter: " << counter << endl;
00342 
00343 
00344   if (dbe == NULL) {
00345     dbe = edm::Service<DQMStore>().operator->();
00346   }
00347 
00348   if (dbe == NULL) {
00349     throw cms::Exception("postEventProcessing", "FUShmDQMOutputService")
00350       << "Unable to lookup the DQMStore service!\n";
00351   }
00352 
00353   //Lets convert histograms into TObjects and throw them in DQMEvent::TObjectTable
00354 
00355 
00356   // determine the top level folders (these will be used for grouping
00357   // monitor elements into DQM Events)
00358   std::vector<std::string> topLevelFolderList;
00359   //std::cout << "### SenderService, pwd = " << dbe->pwd() << std::endl;
00360   dbe->cd();
00361   //std::cout << "### SenderService, pwd = " << dbe->pwd() << std::endl;
00362   topLevelFolderList = dbe->getSubdirs();
00363 
00364   // find the monitor elements under each top level folder (including
00365   // subdirectories)
00366   std::map< std::string, DQMEvent::TObjectTable > toMap;
00367   std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator dirIter;
00368   for (dirIter = topLevelFolderList.begin();
00369        dirIter != topLevelFolderList.end();
00370        dirIter++) {
00371     std::string dirName = *dirIter;
00372     DQMEvent::TObjectTable toTable;
00373     cout <<"dirName= "<<dirName<<endl; 
00374     // find the MEs
00375     findMonitorElements(toTable, dirName);
00376 
00377     // store the list in the map
00378     toMap[dirName] = toTable;
00379   }
00380 
00381   //Buffer where DQM Evenet Msg will be built 
00382   typedef std::vector<uint8> Buffer;
00383   //Lets go with a fix size buffer for now
00384 
00385   // create a DQMEvent message for each top-level folder
00386   // and write each to the shared memory
00387   for (dirIter = topLevelFolderList.begin();
00388        dirIter != topLevelFolderList.end();
00389        dirIter++) {
00390     std::string dirName = *dirIter;
00391     DQMEvent::TObjectTable toTable = toMap[dirName];
00392     if (toTable.size() == 0) {continue;}
00393 
00394 
00395     Buffer buf(1024);
00396   
00397     uint32 lumiSection = 789;
00398     uint32 updateNumber = 111;
00399 
00400     // serialize the monitor element data
00401     serializeWorker_.serializeDQMEvent(toTable, useCompression_,
00402                                        compressionLevel_);
00403 
00404     // resize the message buffer, if needed 
00405     unsigned int srcSize = serializeWorker_.currentSpaceUsed();
00406     unsigned int newSize = srcSize + 50000;  // allow for header
00407     if (buf.size() < newSize) buf.resize(newSize);
00408 
00409 
00410     // create the message
00411     DQMEventMsgBuilder dqmMsgBuilder(&buf[0], buf.size(),
00412                                         iEvent.id().run(), iEvent.id().event(),
00413                                         iEvent.time(),
00414                                         lumiSection, updateNumber,
00415                                         edm::getReleaseVersion(), dirName,
00416                                         toTable);
00417 
00418     // copy the serialized data into the message
00419     unsigned char* src = serializeWorker_.bufferPointer();
00420     std::copy(src,src + srcSize, dqmMsgBuilder.eventAddress());
00421     dqmMsgBuilder.setEventLength(srcSize);
00422     if (useCompression_) {
00423       dqmMsgBuilder.setCompressionFlag(serializeWorker_.currentEventSize());
00424     }
00425 
00426 
00427    //Let us write this message into a File as well
00428    dqmOutputFile_->write(dqmMsgBuilder);
00429 
00430 
00431    /****
00432    //Lets print it
00433    DQMEventMsgView dqmEventView(&buf[0]);
00434       std::cout << "  DQM Message data:" << std::endl;
00435       std::cout << "    protocol version = "
00436                 << dqmEventView.protocolVersion() << std::endl;
00437       std::cout << "    header size = "
00438                 << dqmEventView.headerSize() << std::endl;
00439       std::cout << "    run number = "
00440                 << dqmEventView.runNumber() << std::endl;
00441       std::cout << "    event number = "
00442                 << dqmEventView.eventNumberAtUpdate() << std::endl;
00443       std::cout << "    lumi section = "
00444                 << dqmEventView.lumiSection() << std::endl;
00445       std::cout << "    update number = "
00446                 << dqmEventView.updateNumber() << std::endl;
00447       std::cout << "    compression flag = "
00448                 << dqmEventView.compressionFlag() << std::endl;
00449       std::cout << "    reserved word = "
00450                 << dqmEventView.reserved() << std::endl;
00451       std::cout << "    release tag = "
00452                 << dqmEventView.releaseTag() << std::endl;
00453       std::cout << "    top folder name = "
00454                 << dqmEventView.topFolderName() << std::endl;
00455       std::cout << "    sub folder count = "
00456                 << dqmEventView.subFolderCount() << std::endl;
00457       std::cout << "    time stamp = "
00458                 << dqmEventView.timeStamp().value() << std::endl;
00459 
00460       std::auto_ptr<DQMEvent::TObjectTable> toTablePtr =
00461         deserializeWorker_.deserializeDQMEvent(dqmEventView);
00462       DQMEvent::TObjectTable::const_iterator toIter;
00463       for (toIter = toTablePtr->begin();
00464            toIter != toTablePtr->end(); toIter++) {
00465         std::string subFolderName = toIter->first;
00466         std::cout << "  folder = " << subFolderName << std::endl;
00467         std::vector<TObject *> toList = toIter->second;
00468         for (int tdx = 0; tdx < (int) toList.size(); tdx++) {
00469           TObject *toPtr = toList[tdx];
00470           std::string cls = toPtr->IsA()->GetName();
00471           std::string nm = toPtr->GetName();
00472           std::cout << "    TObject class = " << cls
00473                     << ", name = " << nm << std::endl;
00474         }
00475       }   ***/
00476 
00477   }//for loop
00478 
00479 
00480 }
